jobDescription: Job Post Index  1F6C6E-Sy## Location  San Diego, CA Description:DescriptionSeeking an Analytical Scientist to provide analytical support for the enzyme development projects and enzyme production.Focus on the characterization of enzymes, their reaction products, and fermentation metabolomics.Hands-on approach to analytical method development with expertise in separations and spectroscopy.Applicable analytical methodologies include, but are not limited to HPLC, LC-MS (QqQ and QTOF), and GC-FID.Developing high throughput analytical methods, optimizing existing analytical methodsOperating and maintaining analytical instrumentationProviding timely reports of data.
